content.description: The diagram below shows a circuit composed of three logic gates. Each gate takes two inputs and produces a single output.
content.question: For which of the following input values will the circuit have an output of  ?

choices.label: A equals true, B equals false, C equals false, D equals false
A equals true, B equals true, C equals false, D equals false
A equals false, B equals false, C equals true, D equals true
A equals false, B equals false, C equals false, D equals true

content.answer: A equals true, B equals false, C equals false, D equals false

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
